channel.title: Smelting code help

item.title: Smelting code help
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Hey everyone, Im on deltascape’s source, and he doesn’t have steel bars in use, so I decided to add it. I inputed this code under case 192 ( IfUsedOnObject ).

if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 440 && playerLevel[13] >= 15){
deleteItem(440, 1);
addItem(2351, 1);
sM("You smelt a iron bar.");
setAnimation(899);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(1500, 13);
} else if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 440 && playerHasItem(453, 2) && playerLevel[13] >= 30) {
deleteItem(440, 1);
deleteItem(453, 2);
addItem(2353, 1);
sM("You smelt a steel bar.");
setAnimation(899);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(2500, 13);
}

But it only makes Iron bars, and not steel. Any idea how to fix it?
Thanks.

Read full topic
